resources.string: An error occurred and we have already notified Technical Support
You are about to remove this card from the list
Location permission has not been granted. \nWould you like to grant it at this time??
Location permission was denied and to undo this you need to go to the application settings and activate this permission manually.\n Do you want to open the configuration screen?
The permission to save files on your phone has not been granted.\nWould you like to grant it right now?

The permission to save files was denied and to undo this decision it is necessary to go to the application settings and activate this permission manually.\nDo you want to open the configuration screen?
Please give permission to access your camera and take a photo. Are you sure to deny this permission?
We can not to the camera. Please go to the application settings and activate this permission.\nDo you want to open the configuration screen?
Permission to read files on your phone has not been granted\nWould you like to grant it right now?

The permission to read files was denied and to undo this decision it is necessary to go to the application settings and activate this permission manually.\nDo you want to open the configuration screen?
